page.title: 10THE HARBOUR FISH SHOP
page.content: {The Harbour Fish Shop}is owned and run by three generations of the MacKay family - Alex. MacKay senior, his son and grandson. They buy fish at Wick, Scrabster and Kinlochbervie. Haddock at Â£1.30 a lb. is the most popular fish sold and halibut the most expensive at Â£2.20. Friday is the busiest day and on Thursday afternoon we watched them filleting the fish and putting it in the refrigerator ready for sale. The waste fish is used as bait for lobsters and crabs. For smoking fish there is a kiln where they hang the fish on poles to smoke over night. Lobster and salmon prices vary from Â£2 to Â£5 per lb. Other prices are - cod Â£1.25, whiting Â£1, plaice Â£1.50, lemon sole Â£1.60, dabs Â£1, skate 80p, herring 95p, monkfish 80p, crabs 40p, kippers 86p, cockles 60p, winkles 50p.
